column5: Hi All,  I know some guys get skien from the cleaning stations at some of the harbours.... anyone tell me where if there is one around Bronte or Oakville?  Thanks, Burt
Port Credit has a cleaning station, I think thats your best bet.  Not sure if Fisherman's Pier  has one.
I think the Bronte river is a cleaning station from what I have read.
You'll find both the East and West banks, from the lake to highway 407 and beyond to be excellent cleaning stations.

Gutting and "cleaning" salmon and steelhead for their eggs stream side would be illegal, ie. wasting fish and leaving refuse behind on public AND privateproperty. For the Bronte bait angler, situation normal.
Head to port credit around 1 pm or 8pm that's when the charters usually come in from their trips.
